title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document the comprehensive project scope, detailed functional and non-functional requirements, potential solutions, constraints, and any limitations for the SkillGapBridge system. The focus should be on providing a clear understanding of the project's objectives, essential features, performance characteristics, security considerations, scalability needs, and any other applicable aspects.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for employees and administrators to interact with the system.

title: Implement Skill Assessment Module
description: Develop the module responsible for assessing an employee's current skill set and desired future role.

title: Develop Learning Path Recommendation Engine
description: Implement the AI engine that recommends learning paths to bridge the identified skill gaps.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the database schema and data management processes for storing and retrieving employee data, skill assessments, and learning paths.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Ensure proper security measures and access controls are in place to protect employee data and system integrity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the SkillGapBridge system.

title: Develop Testing Strategy and Test Cases
description: Define a comprehensive testing strategy and create test cases to ensure the system's functionality and reliability.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user guides, training materials, and other documentation to support the adoption and effective use of the SkillGapBridge system.
